sentence.Network_en: He began to talk in his most gentle and avuncular manner.
sentence.Network_cn: 他开始讲话了，态度极其和蔼而慈祥。

sentence.Network_en: He was now playing the role of disinterested host and avuncular mentor.
sentence.Network_cn: 他现在正扮演着慷慨的主人和伯父似的指导人的角色.

sentence.Network_en: He adopt an avuncular tone of voice when give advice to junior colleagues.
sentence.Network_cn: 他用长辈的口气劝告年轻的同事.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Latin avunculus 'maternal uncle', diminutive of avus 'grandfather'

entry.tran: 慈祥的;照顾年轻人的;有长者风范的
entry.def: An avuncular man or a man with avuncular behaviour is friendly and helpful towards someone younger.

example.ex: He began to talk in his most gentle and avuncular manner.
example.tran: 他开始讲话了，态度极其和蔼而慈祥。

means.word_mean: 1. being or relating to an uncle
2. like an uncle in kindness or indulgence;
